Lesmes Monteiro (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-eti egwu Guinea Bissauan nke a maara maka ọrụ ya maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ.
Ọ bụ onye otu Vigilant Non-Compliant Citizen's Movement (MCCI).
N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, otu ìgwè ndị ọ na-amaghị wakporo ya maka ebubo ngagharị iwe megide Onye isi ala José Mário Vaz.
Monteiro nwere akara ugo mmụta iwu site na Faculty of Law nke Bissau
